data.title: Ron Swanson
data.tagline: Give me all the bacon and eggs you have. And a glass of Scotch.
data.description: Director of the Parks Department. Lover of woodworking, whiskey, and freedom.

data.title: Leslie Knope
data.tagline: Friends, waffles, and work. But work has to come third.
data.description: Deputy Director of Parks and Recreation. Binder enthusiast and eternal optimist.

data.title: Andy Dwyer
data.description: Shoeshiner, rockstar, and part-time secret agent. Lead singer of Mouse Rat.
